content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and a steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) 
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and another transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burner inserters have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent fuel depletion.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the electric network to function properly.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to operate.
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent item depletion.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Regularly check the status of entities to prevent ingredient depletion.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected to a fluid source to function.
- Regularly check the status of pipe groups to prevent emptying.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network to function.
- Regularly check the status of electricity groups to prevent disconnection.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
